EmailTemplate.name: turbonomic revisit and mlb all-star game raffle (1495545433.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: turbonomic revisit and mlb all-star game raffle (1495545433.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Travis, Hope you are having a great Tuesday morning! I understand that you have had conversations with a few of my colleges in the past and I wanted to reach out to let you know that we are running a special promotion for meeting with us over the next month! If you complete an introductory meeting with Turbonomic before June 23rd, we will enter you in a raffle to win a trip for two (2) to the 2017 MLB All-Star Game in Miami, Florida from July 9 - 12, 2017. If you’d like to be entered, you can visit this page <[[https://turbonomic.com/mlb-all-star-experience-giveaway/]]>, or just let me know and I will work with you directly to schedule our meeting and put you into the raffle. I would love the opportunity to meet with you to see if Turbonomic would be valuable to you and your team. Thanks,Maggie Margaret Schroeder - Turbonomic Sales Development Representative O: 857.305.4608 C: 802.440.2128 500 Boylston Street, Boston, MA 02116
